selected_quotes: Stop it evolution. Now you are just being weird.
i'm no expert in ant paleontology but this sure looks like cordyceps to me
A unicorn ant! Extreme morphogenesis ecological specialization among Cretaceous basal ants
Extraordinary! A trap jaw ant from Burmese amber (99mya) with 'horn' on its head for catching large prey

citation.abstract: Ants comprise one lineage of the triumvirate of eusocial insects and experienced their early diversification within the Cretaceous [1-9]. Their ecological success is generally attributed to their remarkable social behavior. Not all ants cooperate in social hunting, however, and some of the most effective predatory ants are solitary hunters with powerful trap jaws [10]. Recent evolutionary studies predict that the early branching lineages of extant ants formed small colonies of ground-dwelling, solitary specialist predators [2, 5, 7, 11, 12], while some Cretaceous fossils suggest group recruitment and socially advanced behavior among stem-group ants [9]. We describe a trap-jaw ant from 99 million-year-old Burmese amber with head structures that presumably functioned as a highly specialized trap for large-bodied prey. These are a cephalic horn resulting from an extreme modification of the clypeus hitherto unseen among living and extinct ants and scythe-like mandibles that extend high above the head, both demonstrating the presence of exaggerated morphogenesis early among stem-group ants. The new ant belongs to the Haidomyrmecini, possibly the earliest ant lineage [9], and together these trap-jaw ants suggest that at least some of the earliest Formicidae were solitary specialist predators. With their peculiar adaptations, haidomyrmecines had a refined ecology shortly following the advent of ants.
citation.title: Extreme Morphogenesis and Ecological Specialization among Cretaceous Basal Ants

news.title: 南京古生物所等白垩纪蚂蚁及其社会化起源...
news.summary: 昆虫的社会行为（广义）是指昆虫集群生活，并出现了较复杂的分工协作关系，其中育幼行为（照顾后代的行为）是社会性起源的基础。近年来，中国科学院南京地质古生物研究所中生代研究团队一直致力于昆虫社会行为的研究，并取得了一系列成果，如葬甲和介壳虫的育幼行为研究等。 近期，该团队在蚂蚁早期演化及其社会化起源研究中取得了新进展，相关 研究成果 5 月 27 日在线发表于《细胞》（ Cell ）出版集团的子刊《当代生物学》（ Current Biology ）杂志。 蚂蚁是地球上数量最多的昆虫，也是最成功的社会…

wikipedia.summary: Camelomecia is an extinct genus of stem-group ants not placed into any Formicidae subfamily.

wikipedia.title: Odontomachus bauri
wikipedia.summary: Odontomachus bauri is a species of ponerinae ant known as trap jaw ants. The trap jaw consists of mandibles which contain a spring-loaded catch mechanism.

author.name: 松本淳和
author.description: 小4の長女、小2の長男、年長の次女の母です。彫金師をしていましたが今は九大博物館で丸山先生のお手伝いをしてます。ボタンインコの青之助(せいのすけ)とカマキリやその他昆虫を飼っています。着生植物をホヤ中心に育てています(アリ植物やランも好き)。木彫、油絵、彫金、昆虫、動物、植物、恐竜、鉱石、水槽、イタリア （虫画像注意）

author.name: H,SAWADA
author.description: 公私共に虫を狩っています.甲虫屋ですがアリガタバチに寄生されています.ゲスい採集を好みます.興味/昆虫全般(甲虫,キノコバエ,アリガタバチを好んで捕る),日淡,底棲肉食熱帯魚,爬虫類,水生植物,登山,東南アジア,メカ,デレステ

video.title: Paleontology Recap 2016
video.summary:
It’s been a year and I’ve got to recap what happened in paleontology 2016! In this video I discuss everything from ancient sharks to lizards trapped in amber to three eyed reptiles. Hope you enjoy! 
252MYA Website: https://252mya.com/

Tully Mons
